questions.q: This is the house _______ I lived when I was a child.

explanation.translation: 這是我小時候住過的房子。
explanation.grammar: where 引導地點。原句：I lived IN the house. (where = in which)

questions.q: Do you remember the day _______ we first met?

explanation.translation: 你記得我們第一次見面的那天嗎？
explanation.grammar: when 引導時間。原句：We met ON the day. (when = on which)

questions.q: Tell me the reason _______ you were late this morning.

explanation.translation: 告訴我你今天早上遲到的理由。
explanation.grammar: why 引導原因。原句：You were late FOR the reason. (why = for which)

questions.q: Is this the restaurant _______ they serve great pasta?

explanation.translation: 這就是那家供應美味義大利麵的餐廳嗎？
explanation.grammar: 地點副詞 where。原句：They serve pasta IN the restaurant.

questions.q: Summer is the season _______ people love to go swimming.

explanation.translation: 夏天是人們喜愛去游泳的季節。
explanation.grammar: 時間副詞 when。原句：People love to go swimming DURING summer.

questions.q: The library is a place _______ students go to study.

explanation.translation: 圖書館是學生去讀書的地方。
explanation.grammar: 地點副詞 where。原句：Students go to study AT the library.

questions.q: Sunday is the day _______ I usually visit my grandparents.

explanation.translation: 週日是我通常探望祖父母的日子。
explanation.grammar: 時間副詞 when。原句：I visit them ON Sunday.

questions.q: I don't know the reason _______ she is so angry.

explanation.translation: 我不知道她為什麼這麼生氣。
explanation.grammar: 原因副詞 why。常與 the reason 搭配使用。

questions.q: This is the town _______ I was born and raised.

explanation.translation: 這是我出生並長大的小鎮。
explanation.grammar: 地點副詞 where。原句：I was born IN the town.

questions.q: 1945 was the year _______ World War II ended.

explanation.translation: 1945年是第二次世界大戰結束的那一年。
explanation.grammar: 時間副詞 when。原句：The war ended IN that year.

questions.q: The cafe _______ we met is now closed.

explanation.translation: 我們見面的那家咖啡館現在關門了。
explanation.grammar: 地點副詞 where。原句：We met AT the cafe.

questions.q: I can't forget the time _______ we got lost in London.

explanation.translation: 我忘不了我們在倫敦迷路的那次。
explanation.grammar: 時間副詞 when。原句：We got lost AT that time.

questions.q: That is the spot _______ the accident happened.

explanation.translation: 那就是車禍發生的地點。
explanation.grammar: 地點副詞 where。原句：The accident happened AT that spot.

questions.q: There are several reasons _______ students fail exams.

explanation.translation: 有幾個學生考試不及格的原因。
explanation.grammar: 原因副詞 why。解釋 students fail 的理由。

questions.q: I'll never forget the moment _______ I won the race.

explanation.translation: 我永遠不會忘記贏得比賽的那一刻。
explanation.grammar: 時間副詞 when。原句：I won the race AT that moment.
